body:
Hey guys, I want a new intro for my videos, if someone could give me my own intro... THAT WOULD BE AWESOME!
If you guys want me to subscribe to you that will be fine!

Whoever, is kind enough to do this, thank you :)

title: Can Someone Make Me New Intro?

replies.body: Which Herobrine, there are so many now days!
